summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Private After Dark production upgrade. All new features working correctly including wine red theme, AI-generated character portraits, multilingual support with RTL for Arabic, FAQ/Privacy sections, and bot integration.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ returns version 2.0.0 (production upgrade confirmed)
Backend API /api/health returns healthy with telegram_configured: true
Backend API /api/telegram/info returns correct bot link: https://t.me/MidnightDesireAi_bot
Backend API Stripe checkout creation working
Backend API Telegram webhook accepts POST requests
Frontend loads with wine red color scheme (#7F1D1D) - no pink colors detected
Language switcher works perfectly (EN/FR/AR)
Arabic RTL layout renders correctly with dir='rtl' attribute
AI-generated character portraits load successfully for all 3 characters:
- Valeria Voss portrait (569KB PNG): /characters/valeria_card.png
- Luna Mirelle portrait (628KB PNG): /characters/luna_card.png
- Nyx portrait (567KB PNG): /characters/nyx_card.png
Pricing section displays with wine red highlight on Premium tier
FAQ section expands/collapses correctly
Privacy section displays properly
All character chat buttons link to correct Telegram bot
Multilingual content displays correctly in all 3 languages
No error messages or broken functionality detected
Wine red gradient text 'One private line' displays correctly
Wine red CTA buttons function properly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 endpoints working), Frontend: 100% (all production upgrade features functional)
